Changelog
=========

.. include:: includes/all.rst

**debops.unbound**

This project adheres to `Semantic Versioning <http://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html>`__
and `human-readable changelog <http://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/>`__.

The current role maintainer_ is drybjed_.


`debops.unbound master`_ - unreleased
-------------------------------------

.. _debops.unbound master: https://github.com/debops/ansible-unbound/compare/v0.1.1...master


`debops.unbound v0.1.1`_ - 2017-09-04
-------------------------------------

.. _debops.unbound v0.1.1: https://github.com/debops/ansible-unbound/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1

Changed
~~~~~~~

- Remove the included Ansible filter plugins and use the
  ``debops.ansible_plugins`` role instead. [drybjed_]


debops.unbound v0.1.0 - 2017-07-26
----------------------------------

Added
~~~~~

- Initial release. [drybjed_]
